summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for Gratitude America, Ltd. at Deutsche Bank for the period from February 1, 2019, to February 28, 2019. It details various transactions including outgoing money transfers and service charges, highlighting significant financial activities related to the account.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield
persons.context: Stewart Oldfield is mentioned as the contact for personal assistance regarding the account balance and transactions.

events.title: Outgoing Money Transfers
events.description: Two significant outgoing money transfers were made from the Gratitude America, Ltd. account to First Bank Puerto Rico and Citibank, N.A.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St. Thomas, US Virgin Islands 00802
keyFacts: The account balance for Gratitude America, Ltd. as of February 28, 2019, was $2,233,087.94.
There were outgoing money transfers totaling $2,000,000.00 on February 7, 2019.
Service charges and fees for the account were noted, including overdraft fees.
Interest payments of $36.71 were recorded for the account during the statement period.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors or issues with the account statement.
